long_description: With the Energizer Family Charger you can recharge nearly any size battery, including AA, AAA, C, D and even 9-volt batteries. Operation couldn't be easier-just drop the batteries in, close the door and let the charging begin; power is only on when lid is closed. Charge status indicator alerts you when batteries are fully charged. Recharges four AA 2500 mAh NiMH batteries in 3 hours; recharge times vary based on size of batteries. Rechargeable batteries sold separately.
short_description: With the Energizer Family Charger you can recharge nearly any size battery, including AA, AAA, C, D and even 9-volt batteries.
